*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, November 15, 1831. Navigation and custom duties. Conference with Terán. Forecasts.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*I am getting better slowly but cannot yet go out—I can sit up and walk about the room and intend to ride out *date_mentioned n="11-16-1831">tomorrow*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Genl Teran*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Fisher */person_mentioned*have now arrived at *location_mentioned*Anahuac */location_mentioned*there is a report that only 1/4 duties are to be collected—I do not know the truth of this report— The Nelson was to sail on the *date_mentioned n="10-20-1831">20 of October */date_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*New York*/location_mentioned*— You ought not to let your goods stay any time not a day in *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*after they arrive, get them away as soon as you can— I shall go and see the *person_mentioned*Genl */person_mentioned*as soon as I can ride in the Dearborn which will be in 4 or 5 days I think— the prospects of matters are very good and I am in good sperits*/p*
*p*I wish you to remember and remind *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*that I wanted you to settle at *location_mentioned*peach point*/location_mentioned*— the reason I mention this is because *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*will in a very few years be a *location_mentioned*large town*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*round it will be up to 20 or 40 Dolls an acre and then *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*may complain that I had sent you to *location_mentioned*Chocolate Bayou*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*farewell—after my return from *location_mentioned*Anahuac */location_mentioned*I will go and see you before I start for *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-15-1831">Novr 15. 1831*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Angier */person_mentioned*I expect will remove to *location_mentioned*Anahuac*/location_mentioned*, immediately, and perhaps you may buy*person_mentioned* Mrs Angier*/person_mentioned*s Cattle and the *location_mentioned*mill*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*After you get that place under way and well stocked you might then remove to *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*or *location_mentioned*Peach Point*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* Mr James F. Perry */person_mentioned*on *location_mentioned*Chocolate Bayou*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mrs Angier*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
